comments: Thanks for everything you taught us this past semester Mr. Knox! Happy New Years!
Professor Knox is an outstanding teacher! Miller-Motte is very fortunate to have him. Thanks for all you do Professor Knox

Great Teacher.Even when you need help with writing papers he doesn\'t hesitate to help. Mr. Knox always goes the extra mile even if he doesn\'t know something he\'s not afraid to admit it but he will have the answer next time.

I\'m 50 years old, and I must say that most teachers find me very hard to deal with. This is one of the reasons why I left Virgina College. The Instructors seem to laugh at me more than try to provide me with an education I deserve. Well, this was not the case with Mr. Knox. He immediately made me feel right at home. Mr. Knox thanks for helping me.

I have to agree with everyone else. He\'s just a great teacher. Teachers like Mr. Knox don\'t come around to often. Very smart and charming fellow. I just know I\'m going to turn on my t.v one day and see him talking about something important.
Who knew their was so much more to Microsoft word. Thanks Mr. Knox

Mr. Knox has so much to offer when it comes to IT-100. Their was never a time that I felt I coudn\'t raise my hand. He always said if anyone would laugh at a question, he would deduct points from them. That made me feel so comfortable because I knew he really had us at heart. All teachers should take notes from Mr. Knox. So young but yet so wise.
He is so great at what he does. The world needs more MR. KNOX\'S
My Favorite teacher of all time. Everyday I came in his class he mad me laugh. It just feels good to have a place where learning is made fun.

I feel very fortunate to have had Mr. Knox as my instructor this past semester. The way he teaches just seems like he ought to be somewhere like harvard university. I read a couple of other student responses above in regarding to Mr. Knox. YES, It does help time fly by when you have a cute instructor :}

When it comes to teaching. Mr. Knox is far superior to any computer teacher I\'ve ever known. Just the way he breaks down everything is amazing. I got a promotion on my job for learning how to use excel 2007.

At first I thought his class was going to be so hard because of my lack of skills on using the computer. He never once took for granted that everyone knew how to use the computers. He broke everything down step by step. I had a lot of fun in his class and I already miss IT-100. To bad he\'s married. lol

This Guy is awesome. Why can\'t more IT teachers be like him. Mr. Know knows what he\'s talking about when it comes to computers. I never saw anyone fall asleep in his class. Keep doing it big Mr. Knox. You\'re the best

Mr. Knox is the best teacher at Miller Motte. (period) I mean he goes out of his way just so everyone can get a clear understanding. If you have no knowledge on computers I strongly suggest taking his class. Oh did I also mention he\'s handsome. .)
